comments.html:
If you read the articles and comments you would see it says: Debian

Which means Linux servers with a server process that understands ATAoE how the storage itself is handled is completely up to the imagination of the Linux sysadmin.
comments.name: Lennie

comments.html: This sounds too good to be true. I actually want to know what hardware is being used for his ATAoE setup to start trying out myself.So "anonymous", please.
